Utility Functions

utility.utility_function.first_spending_check(tx_tainted, case_name=0, service_adr=None, mixer_adr=None, mixer_tx=None, coinjoin_tx=None, lightning_tx=None)[source]

Find the total output value of the outputs that reach entities or pets for the first time.

Parameters

  • tx_tainted – Dataframe for the checking process.

  • case_name – Optional case name for the index column.

  • service_adr – Dataframe containing service adr.

  • mixer_adr – Dataframe containing mixer adr.

  • mixer_tx – Dataframe containing mixer transaction.

  • coinjoin_tx – Dataframe containing coinjoin transaction.

  • lightning_tx – Dataframe containing lightning network transaction.

Returns

Dataframe excluding transactions after the assigned transactions in remove.

utility.utility_function.get_inout(tx_df, search_df, search_with)[source]

Search input or output from database using the addresses or tx_index

Parameters

  • tx_df – Either input_tx or output_tx dataframe.

  • search_df – Dataframe containing tx_index to search for related input or output.

  • search_with – String of either ‘tx_index’ for transaction search or ‘adr_index’ for adr search.

Returns

Dataframe containing inputs or outputs belonging to the assigned transactions in search_df.

utility.utility_function.read_option(file_name, path='', csv_index=None)[source]

Read dataframe file depending on the file extension :param file_name: Filename with file extension e.g., df.csv. :param path: Path string to file’s folder. :param csv_index: Optional assigned index column for csv read.

Returns

Dataframe read from the file.

utility.utility_function.remove_service(tx_tainted, service_adr)[source]

Remove transaction chain starting from the next transactions of outputs that received by service adr found in service_adr

Parameters

  • tx_tainted – Dataframe for the removal process.

  • service_adr – Dataframe containing service adr.

Returns

Dataframe excluding transactions after the service outputs.

utility.utility_function.remove_txchain(tx_tainted, remove)[source]

Remove transaction chain after the transaction provided in the remove argument

Parameters

  • tx_tainted – Dataframe for the removal process.

  • remove – Array like variable that contain list of tx_index for spending transactions removal.

Returns

Dataframe excluding transactions after the assigned transactions in remove.
